item.description:
It's time again to party with Revolve Nation! Join Revolve Nation's Boston Entrepreneur's Network, the largest community of entrepreneurs and business owners in the city of Boston, for this special "Summer Kick-Off" Networking Event at The Greatest Bar in Boston!

Enjoy hors d'oeuvres a cash bar, and raffle give-away prizes, all Thanks to our sponsors!

Network, socialize, learn, and promote a thriving community of more than 150 of Boston's Leading Entrepreneurs and Innovators ~ just like you! Be sure to reserve you place early to share in a fun night to reconnect with old friends, and share with us your most recent "spark" in your business, upcoming plans for development, and innovation!

Join us for a stimulating atmosphere of networking, connecting with fellow entrepreneurs and Boston leaders alike, and being an active member of a closely-knit entrepreneurial community at a great venue (we have the entire fourth floor to ourselves!)

When: Wednesday, June 23, 2010 from 6-9pm.

Sponsored By:
Revolve, Inc.: Accelerate the Revolution
A business accelerator designed to grow businesses from start-up to an exit event with a unique combination of business execution, business law, and business capital.

Exemplar Companies: No Hourly Bull
Exemplar is the first law firm in the nation to abandon hourly billing in favor of a fixed, value-based pricing model.
item.name: Summer "Kick-Off" Event: Large Group Networking at The Greatest Bar!!
